title: Butter Rum Sauce
ingredients: 2 teaspoons of rum extract; or, rum to taste
instructions: Melt the butter in a saucepan over medium heat and slowly stir in the powdered sugar.  Add the rum extract and heat until bubbly.
Remove from the heat and set aside to use warm.
Source:  Southern Comfort by Bonnie Walker, Taste Section, Express-News, Wednesday, April 5, 2006.
